about_the_game:
The first lord of the Pavilion of Spirits passed away, and it fell under the control of the three of them. the Reincarnation Trials became radical and weird everywhere. Those scholars who were focused on research also began to feel uneasy, as if something uncontrollable was happening.



A hidden plane exists at the Pavilion of Spirits, the secret base of three mysterious persons. Countless arcane implements brimming with energy riddle the area. This plane is called the [Pavilion of Darkness], the Reincarnation Trial's greatest secret.

A mysterious person used an ancient technique to create eight beings from Soul Crystals. These beings became known as the Charim.



While possessing their original memories, the Soul Crystals have distorted the Charim into beings of pure hatred and violence. The trial they undergo within the dark dimension is known as the [Incarnation of Darkness]. Should a Charim grow powerful enough, they can break free and cross the boundaries between dimensions to exact the revenge they so vehemently seek.

Incarnation of Darkness




The Incarnation of Darkness DLC comes with its own difficulty level. Anything can happen as the difficulty intensifies; the possibilities are endless.

8 Charim Characters




These brand-new characters come with unique weapons and talents. They are mighty indeed. But with great power comes great responsibility—the trials they face are even more terrifying.

16 New Relics


As the Charim gains further strength, each will unlock 2 new relics for a total of 16.



【Soul Set】
Doubles the souls gained from killing enemies. When you gain souls, gain an equal amount of magic power.
  • Soul Jade
    Taking a fatal blow while above 50 souls will remove 50 souls and revive you at full health. Can only be triggered once per room and has lower priority than Divine Soul Jade.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "A strange mutation from the old Divine Soul Jade. Unlike its predecessor, this one can be activated repeatedly at the cost of a huge amount of soul. Useful, but has its merits and its drawbacks."
  • Demon Crystal
    Casting a spell above 10 souls will remove 10 souls and cast Demon Crystal Tide.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "Demon Crystal is a relic made by mimicking Ajiela's power. When the owner casts a skill, they can expend souls to unleash a Demon Crystal Tide; very powerful indeed."
  • Soul Hammer
    Increases attack power by 30%; enemies struck by the owner of this effect staggers and take longer to recover from hits.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "I built this hammer based on forging techniques I learned from the hammer lady. It will allow its user to stagger their opponents for longer."
  • Soul Blade
    If your soul is above 0, gain 100% attack but lose 1 soul every 20 seconds.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "Soul Blade is an energy relic that can be applied to the user's weapon. Very powerful but drains a lot of souls."
  • Soul Ward
    Each successful Block restores 5 HP while a Perfect Block grants 5 seconds of invincibility.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "Soul Ward is the most successful soul relic yet! Any weapons or shields imbued with it will grant beneficial effects to its user when successfully parrying an attack!"
  • Soul Pupil
    The target takes 5 additional damage for each soul that they have.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "Soul Pupil is specially crafted for Soul Hunters. It turns anything with souls into juicy prey."
  • Demonic Soul Converter
    After using, convert 10 souls into 50 Magic Power.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "Turning souls into useful fuel is something I've wanted to do for a long time. This converter can convert souls into magic power, the results are somewhat unsatisfactory, however."
  • Sanguine Soul Converter
    After using, convert 10 HP into 1 soul.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "We usually obtain soul from living things. However, if only it was possible to extract souls from blood instead of killing the host... this converter is only a product of preliminary experiments."


【Rampage Set】
Gain the Heavenly Eye power. Randomly increase either HP, magic power, or attack power by 100. When the set is activated, reset the current chapter.

  • Rampage Magnifier
    The user becomes gigantic and doubles their Max HP, attack power is increased by 100%, movement is slowed, and can now damage enemies by sprinting into them.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "The Magnifier is a failed experiment that has yielded entertaining results. It does what its name suggests, albeit with very severe side effects."
  • Unstable Collider
    Attacking a target has a chance to either instantly kill the target, deal double damage, or deal no damage at all. This effect also affects you and bosses, except the instant death becomes taking triple damage.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "Collider is used to create tunnels in the fabric of space. Its effect is unstable, but who cares? We simply need to spend more resources and test it as much as we can. Or, might be more fun to use it for something entirely different."
  • Unstable Converter
    Every 30 seconds, your attributes will be changed to a random number. This includes HP, magic power, movement speed, attack power and different types of elemental damage.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "The converter was initially used to adjust certain data but was later found to be useful for other things. The only problem was that its parameters were sporadic and had to predict."
  • Rampage Challenger
    Can only be used once. Spawn a random enemy when used and grants a random reward upon defeating it.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "The challenger will create any living organism with sufficient ingredients and materials, it'll really create anything!"
  • Mysterious Egg
    Randomly hatch a Shade that follows you around.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "I love the mysterious egg! We have this game where we pick our egg and see which one of our hatchlings is the strongest."
  • Rampage Morph Potion
    Attacking a target has a chance to change the target into a random creature.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "No one wants to try the Morph Potion in the fear that they'll turn into something monstrous. So we applied this to weapons and start morphing our enemies, how fun!"
  • Rampage Skill Enhancer
    Using a skill gives a chance to create a Magic Power Orb, a Magic Potion, or lose some or even all magic power and create a large explosion.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "Skill enhancement has been a rather difficult procedure due to the unpredictable nature of the subject matter. Still, we managed to achieve the impossible, although the effect is still somewhat unsatisfactory."
  • Rampage Summon Token
    At any time or place, summon a random boss or challenger. Defeating them offers certain rewards.
    "Dark Zone Research Notes": "We originally wanted to create a bell that can summon friends. However, the result was something that could summon immensely powerful enemies. They said this is not bad either, how strange."

The Reincarnation Trial to save the world is going in a strange direction, will it bring hope or destruction?

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: A mysterious person used an ancient technique to create eight beings from Soul Crystals. These beings became known as the Charim—a race whose far more arduous trials take place in the [Incarnation of Darkness].
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, Korean
